title: when is this going to be looked at as deviant behavior?
body:
http://i.imgur.com/CgkQ05E.png

http://i.imgur.com/GWN7D2I.png

people who destroy the ladder by duo queueing and knocking people out, forcing other more deserving people down because a duo/smurf has to carry this well below average player up to get the end of season rewards that they want.

the biggest offense is the significant number of games they ruin on their way down.  

sure i report it as cheating, what else can i do about it other than lose on the spot because this person finally decided to play solo today instead of with their friend.

replies.body: how does playing normals with friends affect the ranked que im confused?

One ranked game in the last week, and a shitload of people on his recently played with list...

He's playing normals with friends. There is absolutely nothing wrong with that.
Whats the problem. He is just low gold with bad winrate. Whats so special about it?

care to explain how he got up there? 

*boosted*

(*and whats the punishment exactly*)

> [{quoted}](name=CrestKnight,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=5T7TTTne,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-07-12T12:58:28.908+0000)
>
> care to explain how he got up there? 
> 
> *boosted*
> 
> (*and whats the punishment exactly*)

Up where? its just gold 5... 

https://euw.op.gg/summoner/userName=Nyn%C3%A0eve

I was messing around on my EUW account, played only 10 games, played like shit yet got gold 3. Its not Diamond 5, its Gold 5

the principal remains, any player outside of their true rank destroys the integrity of the match.

a clearly silver or even bronze player happened to make its way into a plat+ game just now at 1690 elo. 

although it was normals, this player was horribly outmatched and failed to do anything at all. literally unusable to the team.

its not the matchmaker at fault here, its someone gaming the system. wheres the repercussion?
Bro all of this for norms? Grow a pair and play ranked
Well, you can't prevent people from playing with friends;

> [{quoted}](name=Starcraft243ver,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=5T7TTTne,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-12T12:18:24.735+0000)
>
> Well, you can't prevent people from playing with friends;

But you can make solo queue a true solo queue like they promised they would do before season 6 when they introduced dynamic queue.

Riot promissed we'd get a pure solo queue,  but then we got stuck a whole season with DQ instead. Now instead of an actual solo queue we just got the old duo queue instead along with the DQ;FQ. 

Yeah, Riot only cares about competitive integrity for Master tier and up only.
